Posts.Content: 1StrongAngel wrote: Hi I've just finished chemo December 2014 and I was just curious as to whether any of you ladies experienced permanent menapause after chemo and if your cycle did return how long did it take to come after chemo. I'm only 26 so I'm really hoping I don't go into permanent menapause. Dx 8/4/2014, IDC, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, ER-/PR-, HER2- Chemotherapy 8/26/2014 AC + T (Taxol) Surgery 1/15/2015 Mastectomy: Left, Right; Reconstruction (left): Nipple reconstruction, Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Nipple reconstruction, Tissue expander placement Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Fertility After Chemo 1StrongAngel LittleFlower
